results.title: Cholesterol-lowering therapy in women and elderly patients with myocardial infarction or angina pectoris: findings from the Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study (4S)
results.text_hl: The present study provides a detailed, post hoc assessment of the efficacy and safety of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy in the following subgroups of @<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_IV</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006011 @@@4S@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@: those > or = 65 years of age, those < 65 years of age, @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@, and @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@.

citations.NLM: Miettinen TA, Pyörälä K, Olsson AG, Musliner TA, Cook TJ, Faergeman O, Berg K, Pedersen T, Kjekshus J. Cholesterol-lowering therapy in women and elderly patients with myocardial infarction or angina pectoris: findings from the Scandinavian Simvastatin Survival Study (4S) Circulation. 1997 Dec 16;96(12):4211-8. PMID: 9416884
